Arun Nayar: early life, education and family

Nayar was born to his parents Gunnar Nayar and Vinod Nayar in December 1964 in Burmantofts, UK. During his childhood, he spent much of his time with his brother’s brother Nikhil Nayar. His brother is of Indian-German descent. Talking about his parents, his father’s profession is not available however, his mother is a business woman. She owns a textile company in Mumbai, India. Growing up after Nayar’s parents had his younger brother, they decided to separate. Also, speaking of his educational qualifications, he enrolled in Millfield Boarding School, England. Also, for his higher studies, he studied at Imperial College and graduated in Physics.

Arun Nayar: career and achievements

Nayar is an international businessman and entrepreneur by profession. In addition, he runs a technology company Direction Software Solutions. The company is headquartered in Mumbai, India.

Arun Nayar: personal life and wife

Nayar was married three times. His first wife’s name is Valentina Pedroni. In 1997, he and Pedroni married. Pedroni was a model born in Italy. However, only after 5 years of marriage, the two parted ways. After that, he dated Elizabeth Hurley, an English model and actress. At the Christian Dior show in Paris, they made their first public appearance. Finally, they got married in the year 2007, however, they divorced due to their personal differences.

After that, Nayar had a brief dating relationship with Liz Hurley that didn’t last long. In addition, Nayar met model and personal trainer Kim Johnson and became romantically involved with her. The couple finally got married on July 30, 2016, but sadly they are no longer together.

The 56-year-old businessman is very handsome to look at. Furthermore, he has charming facial features, dazzling brown eyes, and has an Indian skin tone. Furthermore, he is 1.7 meters tall and weighs around 55 kg. Also, his other body measurements are 40-34-35.
